name: After the last Second
description:
Experience the short story about a little girl trapped in a post-apocalyptic nightmare... all alone.

Can you help her finally finding someone to stand by her in this lost and ruined world?

In this short game, made for the Wowie GameJam 4.0 you will play a little girl that somehow survived apocalyptic events, which left the world in pieces.

Explore what's left of it and hopefully you finally find some other human beings...

Controls: Mouse

Programming: Flyx

Story: Flyx

Characters and objects: Flyx

Backgrounds: Midjourney (text-to-image-generation ai)

Music: free Assets from pixabay
